title: Fix logo image not displaying on the site

requirements.text: Debug and fix the logo image display issue by verifying the image file exists at frontend/public/assets/generated/reapers-asylum-logo.png, checking that the image path references in Navbar.tsx and HomePage.tsx are correct, and ensuring the image is being properly served as a static asset
acceptanceCriteria: The Reapers Asylum MC logo displays correctly in the Navbar component
The Reapers Asylum MC logo displays correctly in the HomePage hero section
The logo loads without 404 errors in the browser console
The logo is visible on both initial page load and after navigation

requirements.text: If the logo image file is missing from frontend/public/assets/generated/, regenerate it and ensure it is properly copied to the public assets directory during the build process
acceptanceCriteria: The logo file exists at the correct path in the deployed application
The image can be accessed directly via its URL path
The build process includes the generated assets in the deployment bundle

constraints: Do not modify the backend - this is a frontend asset display issue
Maintain the existing image path structure using frontend/public/assets/generated/
Keep the logo implementation in Navbar.tsx and HomePage.tsx consistent with the current approach
nonGoals: Creating a new logo design or replacing the existing logo
Changing the overall navigation or homepage layout

required: Reapers Asylum MC logo featuring a grim reaper with crossed scythes, 'REAPERS ASYLUM' top rocker text, 'NOMADS' bottom rocker text, and 'MC' patch, rendered on transparent background with high contrast for dark backgrounds (reapers-asylum-logo.dim_400x400.png)
